org.sd.cluster.config
Class ConfigUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.config.ConfigUtil

public class ConfigUtil
extends java.lang.Object

General static utilties for config.

NOTE: these utilities need to be used in the proper context. The class is package protected to prevent improper use. For a class to access what this class provides, it should use Config and ClusterDefinition accessors.

Author:
Spence Koehler
